front.title: RTP Payload Format for H.264 RCDO Video

abstract.t: This memo describes an RTP Payload format for the Reduced-Complexity Decoding Operation (RCDO) for H.264 Baseline profile bitstreams, as specified in H.241. RCDO reduces the decoding cost and resource consumption of the video processing. The RTP Payload format is based on the description in RFC 3984.
